title: Script from a Letterhead Fonts graphic
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what script is being used for the text "New York, Ny 10002" in this graphic from the Letterhead Fonts website? I don't think it's one of theirs.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806102814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TOMMYGUNSNY3A_4866.jpg)

Thanks!
author: bfingeroth

comments.content: You're right! Impressive! Thanks so much!
